document_data.name: Mraed
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20210730214335/https://twitter.com/TheEdVerse/status/1421224959465119745| title = TheEdVerse on Twitter| accessdate = 30-6-2022| date = 30-7-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Mraed''' was a type of a [[nut]]-based dessert prepared in the lands of [[Calimshan]], [[Tharsult]], and the [[Tashalar]].
document_data.Description: Mraed was one of many types of desserts found throughout the [[Realms]], similar to the [[Earth]]'s [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halva halva]. It was a very sweet and nutritious treat of shaped and pressed [[raisin]]s, [[almond]]s, [[pecan]]s, [[date]]s, [[coconut milk]], and [[durr]] (what was known as semolina on Earth). High fat content ensured the dessert's long self life..
